article_title: Autism families push for better, uniform coverage
article_text:

og.description: After hitting some bumps during the setup of the Affordable Care Act, advocates say they're regaining momentum in their effort to expand private insurance coverage for the treatment of autism.
og.title: Autism families push for better, uniform coverage
